评论概述: Long blue Bohemian v neck long sleeved light dress.
评论详情: This dress is very long and the material is soft. I'm not crazy about the design of the fabric or the type of fabric but it's perfect to wear at home. Very comfortable.
I enjoy wearing this dress and receive many compliments when I wear it.  Beautiful pattern.

I love this dress. I’m not sure why the other’s are giving it bad reviews. Mine is gorgeous. I got color #3.  I love the material. I could have probably gone down a size but I’m happy with the way it fits. I can’t wait to wear it to church this Sunday. 💕
